game.name: LOW VALUE JOB
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: LOW VALUE JOB is a dystopian job-simulation game where you sort scattered bolts, nuts, and washers by type. Pick up each part, examine it, and classify it accurately. Play solo to steadily raise your score, or compete online with players around the world to test your sorting skills.
game.shortDescriptionEn: LOW VALUE JOB is a dystopian job-simulation game where you sort scattered bolts, nuts, and washers by type. Pick up each part, examine it, and classify it accurately. Play solo to steadily raise your score, or compete online with players around the world to test your sorting skills.
